name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Plankton's Robotic Revenge
overview: SpongeBob SquarePants: Plankton's Robotic Revenge is an action-adventure video game based on the television series SpongeBob SquarePants. It was released in October 2013 for Wii U, Wii, Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo DS, PlayStation 3, and Xbox 360. The g
